com.cloudbees.plugins.flow.BuildFlow.description:
Fiware-Health - Region Sanity Check

This Job executes the Sanity Check on each FIWARE Lab node. It will try to launch all jobs in a parallel way (if there are resources to do that)

Project source code: https://github.com/telefonicaid/fiware-health/tree/develop/fiware-region-sanity-tests
Documentation: https://github.com/telefonicaid/fiware-health/blob/develop/fiware-region-sanity-tests/README.rst
com.cloudbees.plugins.flow.BuildFlow.dsl: parallel ( { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'Spain2') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'Trento') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'Lannion2') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'Waterford') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'Berlin2') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'Prague') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'Mexico') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'PiraeusN') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'PiraeusU') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'Zurich') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'Karlskrona') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'Volos') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'Budapest') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'Budapest2') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'Stockholm') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'SophiaAntipolis') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'Poznan') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'Gent') }, { build ( "FiHealth-SanityCheck-2-Exec-Region", OS_REGION_NAME: 'Crete') } )
